name: Shutdown Cider
description: This cocktail, created by John Hogan of Lincoln Restaurant and Teddy & the Bully Bar in Washington, DC, is an autumnal take on a pisco sour, made without eggwhite.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Knudsen's Cider & Spice apple cider
1 ounce fresh lemon juice, from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add pisco, apple cider, lemon, simple syrup, and bitters. Shake until well chilled. Strain into an ice-filled serving glass—use crushed ice if desired.
